document_data.name: Thavaun
document_data.mainbody: '''Thavaun''' was a [[Red Wizard]] of [[Thay]], who was involved in a takeover of [[Triel]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: He was capable of disguising himself as someone else with magic.
document_data.History:
At [[Triel]], [[Orthil Voldovan]] began acting strangely, in [[Beldimarr]]'s view, speaking stiffly and taking too long to recognize him.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|301|17}} Thavaun had magically disguised himself as [[Orthil Voldovan]]; Shandril found out about this just as she began her immolation.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|357|20}} However, [[Sharantyr]], once she arrived at the caravan, quickly realized it wasn't him.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|335|19}}

He was slain by [[Arauntar]] in the aftermath of Shandril's immolation.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Somehow, he had been whispered of as far as [[Scornubel]].{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|287|17}} He was known to the [[Harpers]] either in that way or through different means.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|301|17}}
